first_para: Mark Durkan MP (born 26 June 1960) is an Irish politician, from Derry, Northern Ireland. Durkan was the Deputy First Minister of Northern Ireland from 2001 to 2002, and the Leader of the Social Democratic and Labour Party from 2001 to 2010.

full.extract: Mark Durkan MP (born 26 June 1960) is an Irish politician, from Derry, Northern Ireland. Durkan was the Deputy First Minister of Northern Ireland from 2001 to 2002, and the Leader of the Social Democratic and Labour Party from 2001 to 2010.
full.title: Mark Durkan
